headline: Is Mixed Q3 Results, Robotics Win and Legal Hit Altering The Investment Case For Medtronic (MDT)?
summary: Medtronic plc has reported past third-quarter fiscal 2026 results showing revenue rising to US$9.02 billion from US$8.29 billion a year earlier, while net income eased to US$1.14 billion and diluted earnings per share from continuing operations slipped to US$0.89 from US$1.01. Alongside this mix of higher sales and softer profit, Medtronic secured U.S. FDA clearance for its Stealth AXiS spine robotics platform and faced a US$381 million antitrust jury award against it, highlighting both the...
